text: Muhamad Shahrul Hakim Bin Rahim (born 2 February 1995) is a Malaysian professional footballer who plays as a central midfielder for Kelantan United in Malaysia M3 League. ==Club career== ===Kelantan=== On 21 February 2017, Hakim made his league debut playing against Melaka United coming from bench at 86th minutes in 0–2 defeat in Kota Bharu. ===MIFA (loan)=== On 29 June 2017, Hakim was loaned to Liga Premier side MIFA on six-month loan deal. On 30 June 2017, Hakim made his debut for MIFA playing against Kuala Lumpur that end up his team lost by 2–1 score. Hakim made 6 league appearances with MIFA before returned to Kelantan at the end of the 2017 season. ===D'AR Wanderers=== On 27 January 2018, Hakim signed a contract with Liga FAM club D'AR Wanderers after his contract with Kelantan expired. ==Career statistics== ===Club=== {| class=wikitable style="text-align:center" |+ Appearances and goals by club, season and competition |- !rowspan=2|Club !rowspan=2|Season !colspan=3|League !colspan=2|Cup !colspan=2|League Cup !colspan=2|Continental !colspan=2|Total |- !Division!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals |- |rowspan=3|Kelantan |2016 |Liga Super |0||0||0||0||1||0||colspan="2"|–||1||0 |- |2017 |Liga Super |2||0||0||0||0||0||colspan="2"|–||2||0 |- ! colspan=2 |Total !2!!0!!0!!0!!1!!0||colspan="2"|–||3||0 |- |rowspan="2"|MISC-MIFA (loan) |2017 |Liga Premier |6||0||0||0||0||0||colspan="2"|–||6||0 |- ! colspan=2 |Total !6!!0!!0!!0!!0!!0||colspan="2"|–||6||0 |- |rowspan="2"|D'AR Wanderers |2018 |Liga FAM |6||0||0||0||colspan="2"|–||colspan="2"|–||6||0 |- ! colspan=2 |Total !6!!0!!0!!0!!0!!0||colspan="2"|–||6||0 |- |rowspan=3|Kelantan United |2019 |Malaysia M3 League |21||15||2||3||0||0||colspan="2"|–||23||18 |- ! colspan=2 | Career total !35||15||2||3||1||0||colspan="2"|–||38||18 |} ==Honours== ;Kelantan United * Malaysia M3 League : 2019 ==References== ==External links== * Shahrul Hakim at stadiumastro.com Category:1995 births Category:Living people Category:Malaysian people of Malay descent Category:Malaysian Muslims Category:People from Kelantan Category:Malaysian footballers Category:Kelantan FA players Category:MISC-MIFA players Category:Malaysia Super League players Category:Association football midfielders
